original_text: O thou daughter dwelling in Egypt, furnish thyself to go into captivity: for Noph shall be waste and desolate without an inhabitant.
korean_text: 애굽에 사는 딸이여 너는 너를 위하여 포로의 짐을 꾸리라 놉이 황무하며 불에 타서 주민이 없을 것임이라

sentences.original_text: O thou daughter dwelling in Egypt
furnish thyself to go into captivity
for Noph shall be waste and desolate
